venue.address_2: Union Square, opp. Jackson Mann School & Twin Donuts
venue.name: Grasshopper All-Vegan Restaurant

item.description:
Hey guys, I'm so sorry.. I know you guys were expecting the picnic meetup, but as I got into planning it, there are a lot of logistics that need to be taken care of and I don't think there's enough time to plan for Sunday (also, it's partly cloudy with chance of rain--when is it not though right? haha).

However, we can do lunch on Sunday-- There is this really delicious vegan place called Grasshopper in Allston that I love and there's a buffet on every third Sunday and the 19th just happens to be the third Sunday!

Sunday at noon

Grasshopper
1 North Beacon St
Allston, MA 02135
Tel: 617-254-8883
http://grasshopperveg...

Hope all of you can make it! Please RSVP!

Khushali
item.name: Lunch at Grasshopper!
